short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web-based meeting tool allowing you to create presentation,collaboration and sharing the same interactive whiteboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collaborate in real time with all participants’ screens by using the same interactive whiteboard. Media items that are added or changes will be instantly displayed on all participants’ screens no matter where they are in the world.

Be effective during the meeting by sharing knowledge, ideas and decisions. Do instant visual interaction in the same interactive whiteboard.Use video and voice calls, instant messaging and screen sharing.
